page.title: 19The May Day Fair in Rayleigh
page.content:
{The May Day Fair May 6th At 12.00 on Saturday all of our gym team met at Webster's Way car park to do a gym display at the{May Day Fair.} We got in free.We did vaulting and then we did routines in pairs.Our music was{Star Wars.}We did some trampeting.We ran up fast and jumped on the trampet and did forward {somersaults.
I put on my{Wickford Youth Band uniform and went in the van to the fair.I play the {Bell Lyre.}We marched in to the arena playing {Eye Level.}We played 8 more tunes and finished with our{Band Salute.}My dad gave me a Â£1 to spend at the Fair.I got in free but a Hot Dog and a packet of crisps cost me 47p.I went round the back of the Mill Hall to watch the{absailing.
